name: Sweet Style Carrot Spaghetti
description: This Sweet Style Carrot Spaghetti recipe is an excellent choice for those looking for a high-protein, high-fiber, and healthified meal option. It creatively incorporates spiralized carrot noodles, offering a fun twist on traditional pasta while also boosting your daily vegetable intake. Perfect for fitness enthusiasts or anyone seeking a healthier alternative to conventional spaghetti dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by spiralizing 1 cup of carrots into noodles. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, cook 100 grams of beef until browned, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced red onion to the beef, and saut√© until the onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in 2 tablespoons of tomato & basil pasta sauce with the beef and onion, stir well, and let it simmer for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the beef mixture with the spiralized carrot noodles. Toss everything together until the noodles are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the carrot spaghetti topped with 2 tablespoons of grated Parmesan cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
